description: DeleteOptions may be provided when deleting an API object

gracePeriodSeconds.description: The duration in seconds before the object should be deleted. Value must be non-negative integer. The value zero indicates delete immediately. If this value is nil, the default grace period for the specified type will be used. Defaults to a per object value if not specified. zero means delete immediately.

preconditions.description: Preconditions must be fulfilled before an operation (update, delete, etc.) is carried out.

orphanDependents.description: Should the dependent objects be orphaned. If true/false, the "orphan" finalizer will be added to/removed from the object's finalizers list.
